name: History
description: The study of past events, including political, economic, social, and cultural developments.

name: Entertainment
description: Activities or forms of media that provide enjoyment and amusement, such as movies, music, and sports.

name: Technology
description: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.

name: Geography
description: The study of the Earth's surface, its features, and the distribution of life on it, including human and physical geography.

name: Literature
description: The body of written works of a language, period, or culture, including poetry, novels, and plays.

name: Space
description: The vast expanse that exists beyond the Earth's atmosphere, including the study of celestial bodies and phenomena

name: General culture
description: Can cover a wide range of topics, knowledge and disciplines, such as biology, zoology, science, art, literature and more.

name: Cinema
description: The art of making motion pictures, including the techniques of film production, cinematography, screenwriting, and editing.
